text:
e="preserve">Edward Browning "E. B." McClain (April 29, 1940 – November 9, 2020) was an American politician and chemist. He was a Democratic member of both the Alabama Senate from 1995 through 2009 and the Alabama House of Representatives from 1987 through 1994. He was born in Bessemer, Alabama.
In 2009, he was convicted of money laundering and corrpution. He was sentenced to 70 months.
McClain died on November 9, 2020 in Pleasant Grove, Alabama at the age of 80.
